form.label: Performance Management Browser
form.description: Choose an application to view performance management data

input.label: Select an Application:
input.populatingSearch: index=crittercism sourcetype=crittercism | stats dc by appName, appId

search.query: index=crittercism sourcetype="crittercism" "MessageType=ApmEndpointsLatency" appName=$appName$ | rex "\((?<serv>\".*?\")\,(?<val>\d+\.\d+)" max_match=30 | eval fields=mvzip(serv,val) | mvexpand fields | rex field=fields "\"(?<ENDPOINTS>.*?)\",(?<LATENCY>\d+\.\d{2})"|sort -LATENCY | table ENDPOINTS, LATENCY
